```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: busybox
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: main
          image: busybox
          args:
            - sleep
            - infinity
```

    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
